dublin_core.dcvalue: The purpose of this research was to design and realize a real time tele monitoring system with multiphysiological parameters using the Internet Both the Client Server C S mode and Peer to Peer P2P mode were used in the system s network communication The C S mode is used to upload retrieve and download physiological data The P2P mode provides realtime tele monitoring and video chatting between doctors and patients Experiment results show that P2P technology could efficiently improve the transmission speed of the physiological parameters This study demonstrates an effective method of remote monitoring of physiological parameters in real time
Made available in DSpace on 2020-02-10T17:20:38Z (GMT). No. of bitstreams: 0 Previous issue date: 2007-09-12
Telemedicine journal and e-health : the official journal of the American Telemedicine Association
An internet-based telemonitoring system of multiphysiological parameters.
